overview: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2013 ~JAPONESQUE~ is the twelth live video released by Koda Kumi and 16th video release. The first press edition of both formats came with a cardboard slipcase and as fanclub member there was a original stand calendar, too. A different was that the blu-ray edition had the full concert on one disc and the DVD edition on two discs.
title: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2013 ~JAPONESQUE~
